alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 10:44AM CDT until May 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...Louisiana... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Concordia and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY, MAY 20 TO THURSDAY, MAY 26... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...From Friday, May 20 to Thursday, May 26. * IMPACTS...At 48.0 feet, Carthage Point Road becomes impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 44.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday, May 20 and crest at 48.8 feet on Sunday, May 22. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 44.3 Wed 10 am CD 44.8 45.2 45.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CDT.
